About.name: Lo Chan Peng
About.creativeMedia: Specialization | Oil Painting, ink and mix media
About.info:
Lo is a constant prize winner in Taiwan since his young age. Lo has awarded the Union Culture & Art Foundation Young Artist Award (2004), the Chi-mei Cultivation Award (2007), the Cathay Art Award Silver Award (2006), and the Kaohsiung Award (2008). Lo has been working as an artist in resident in worldwide institutions such as ESMoA in Los Angeles (2013) and in Berlin (2011). The recent exhibitions include From hyperrealism to the reality – Lo Chan Peng Solo Exhibition 2020 (Taipei, 2020), Portraiture 2020 (Los Angles, 2020), and Misty (Taipei, 2017). He also attended International Art Fairs hold in London, Tokyo, Osaka, Busan, Soul, Masco, Singapore, Taipei, etc. Lo’s works have been collected by galleries, museums, and collectors around the world, such as ESMoA, National Taiwan Museum of Fine Arts, Chi-met museum, and Union Culture Foundation.
Most of Lo Chan-Peng’s works are focusing on portraitures by using oil colour or ink. In his creation, Lo likes to discuss issues such as time, history, and life and death. With his vivid and exquisite portraits, Lo adds elements to “spoil” the pictures, thereby bringing a strong and unique visual experience to the viewers, also transferring the abstract concept into something that can be seen.

list.question: Q1. Do I need any tool and knowledge before the lessons?
list.answer:
-We suggest you sign up for these lessons with a drawing understanding. For those without any experience, Lo has drawing lessons and the link is here.
-Oil painting materials: paints, brushes, oils, palette, palette knives

list.question: Q2. Do I need oil painting foundation
list.answer: These lessons are for beginners to intermediate students. They are suitable for beginners and intermediate students who wish to advance. Lo is working on lessons for advanced students. He will gradually introduce them in the future.

list.question: Q3. Who is Lo Chan Peng
list.answer: Lo Chan Peng is an international acclaimed artist with exhibitions around the world. For more please click on the link

list.question: Q4. How long can I watch these lessons for?
list.answer: You have unlimited access to the lessons from your computers, tables, or cellphones without the limitation of time or location.

list.question: Q5. How can I get my questions answered?
list.answer: Welcome to send questions to Lo’s Telegram Group There are hundreds of students here as well.

list.question: Q6 How do I purchase?
list.answer: Simple! Click on “Purchase” and you will become a member.

list.question: Q7. What are payments methods
list.answer: Currently we only accept payment via Paypal. Please register with paypal first.

list.question: Q8. Can I send English in Lo’s Telegram link
list.answer: Lo can communicate with English. However, if in depth in English, the members in Lo’s Telegram group will help. These members consist of great artists from around the world. Lo hopes this group will help one another as a big family without border. You are welcome to join first. Not all homework will get critics but watching others’ works in the group will improve your skills as well.

list.question: Q9. If I have further questions after these lessons, what to do?
list.answer: Join Lo’s Telegram group and ask away. Our members are passionate and they are around the world.
